name: Retro Remix: Space Shooter
description:
The aliens are coming! Shoot your lasers in this classic arcade machine.

The planet is on the verge of destruction. Only a heroic ship protects us from the endless waves of alien enemies.

Use years of experience in arcades and your determination to protect the planet!

Features:
● Authentic retro experience.
● Endless waves of original enemies, including the jellyfish, the cricket and the alien spin.
● Destroy the motherships to get the highest score.
● NOW with the online leaderboard.
● Works perfectly on iPhone & iPad.
